info.name: WSO2 Identity Server - Application  Template Rest API
info.description:
This document specifies a **Application Template Management RESTful API** for **WSO2 Identity Server** .


Contact Support:
 Name: WSO2
 Email: architecture@wso2.org

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve the application template information by id.
This API provides the capability to delete an application template by id.
This API provides the capability to retrieve the list of templates.
This API provides the capability to create a template for OIDC web applications.
This API provides the capability to create a template for SAML web applications.
This API provides the capability to create a template for SPA applications.
This API provides the capability to create a template for Windows Desktop applications.
This API provides the capability to create a template for WS Trust applications.
This API provides the capability to create a template for Passive STS applications.
